## Repository structure
Contains R scripts for fitting incubation times with EpiLPS on different pathogens. There is
one script for each pathogen.

### Data folder
Original data sources in tsv, csv or xlsx format.

### Data_continuous folder
Datasets in continuous time for input in `estimIncub()` routine of EpiLPS package.

### Estimates folder
Folder containing incubation period related estimates (Mean, SD,...). More detailed
summary statistics can be retrieved from the R scripts.
